entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
